issues.title: Clean Energy and Climate Change
issues.description: Supports renewable energy development, advocates for wind and solar investments, and supports reducing carbon emissions

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding healthcare access, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and reducing prescription drug costs

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive infrastructure modernization, including broadband expansion, transportation improvements, and green infrastructure

issues.title: Education and Workforce Development
issues.description: Supports increased funding for technical education, student loan reform, and workforce training programs

issues.title: Cybersecurity and Technology
issues.description: Champions national cybersecurity initiatives, supports technology innovation, and protects digital privacy

issues.title: Foreign Policy and National Security
issues.description: Supports strong NATO alliances, diplomatic engagement, and balanced national defense spending

issues.title: Veterans Support
issues.description: Advocates for improved veterans' healthcare, mental health services, and job transition programs
